querystring.select: SELECT A.APP_NO AS AppNo, A.BIZ_TEMPLATE_CODE AS BizTemplateCode, A.APP_ID AS AppId, A.ORI_OFFICE_NAME AS OriOfficeName, b.CUST_NAME AS CustName, A.PROD_OFFERING_NAME AS ProdOfferingName, A.PROD_OFFERING_CODE AS ProdOfferingCode, A.PROD_OFFERING_VERSION AS ProdOfferingVersion, StatDescr.DESCR AS Stat, CurrStepDescr.DESCR AS CurrStep, LastStepDescr.DESCR AS LastStep
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUST b ON A.APP_ID = b.APP_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS StatDescr WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.APP_STAT = StatDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND StatDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS CurrStepDescr WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.APP_CURR_STEP = CurrStepDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND CurrStepDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS LastStepDescr WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.APP_LAST_STEP = LastStepDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND LastStepDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC'
